text: I, Riken Patel, reside in the northern part of the realm, where your commands are followed. I am writing this letter to you to upgrade fitness and sport centre in this site.

As of now, there are nearly good amenities available for the youth. Like, Small cricket ground, table tennis, volley ball court etc. Apart from this, Gym is also here, which is run by corporate officer. And youth are really happy with it.

But, there is not any proper space to play badminton, football and tennis. Nearby this fitness centre, ample space, where, wastage is dumped by local people. If you wish, you could utilize it in worthy way by resurfacing it and some engineering work.
By doing this, the working people can also utilize the facilities by playing the sport whatever they like. Also, they get ride of their workloads, sedentary life and unhealthy life span.
I am waiting for your positive response.
